1: I embrace new opportunities that lead to growth and success.
2: I thrive with support and succeed in my endeavors.
3: I succeed in all I do with divine support.
4: I serve others well and gain their trust and responsibility.
5: My presence brings blessings and abundance to those around me.
6: I trust in the abilities of capable and talented people.
7: I choose to honor my commitments and respect others.
8: I choose to uphold trust and honor in my responsibilities.
9: I choose to act with respect and integrity in all situations.
10: I choose respect and integrity in my relationships.
11: I focus on my tasks with a clear mind.
12: I choose to act with integrity and move away from temptation.
13: I choose to escape from tempting situations.
14: Honesty and courage protect me in challenging situations.
15: I seek help when I feel threatened and find safety.
16: I keep what is valuable close until the right time.
17: I embrace honesty and integrity in all my interactions.
18: I call out in strength, and others respond positively.
19: Honesty fosters trust and understanding in relationships.
20: I embrace new opportunities even in difficult situations.
21: I find kindness and favor even in challenging situations.
22: I take charge and support those around me.
23: What I do succeeds because I have support and guidance.
